title: NV_micromaps glTF extension
description: glTF Extension that adds a list of micromaps for other extensions to reference. These are used, for instance, to define micro-triangle displacement or opacity.

micromaps.gltf_detailedDescription: An array of micromaps.  A micromap contains an array of (formatted, possibly compressed) *values*, and **MAY** store additional *micromap properties*, such as vertex displacement directions.
